title: Son of a Boy Dad: Ep. 83 - Gillis and Bev
description:
The fellas are back in NYC after a week of travel. Sas tells some stories about his time opening for Shane this weekend in Buffalo, joining Bills Mafia, and linking up with Gabe Davis. Rone and Tyler went to LA to record episode 0 of the Pat Bev Podcast, Owen is moving on to the Tim Dillon Show, and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/sonofaboydad
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
